Question:
あの後のスーパーでも同じやり取り。
気まずくてしばらくあの商店街に行けないぞ。
……まぁネコの可愛いところと言われればそうなんだけども。
[バニラ]: 「ん？　くんくん、くんくん……」
[バニラ]: 「あっちからすごくいい匂いがする」
[ショコラ]: 「ほんとだ、すごく香ばしくていい匂いがしますご主人さま！」
[嘉祥]: 「確かに。この匂いは……」
匂いのする方角へと顔を向ける。
[屋台のネコ]: 「いらっしゃいませー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「おいしいできたてのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[屋台のネコ]: 「あっつあつで、かつおぶしたっぷりのたこやき、いかがですかー！」
[ショコラ]: 「わぁ、ネコのたこ焼き屋さんだ！　珍しいですね、ご主人さま！」
reference_answer:
After that, it was the same sort of exchange at the supermarket.
The whole thing was so awkward that I don't think I can visit that shopping district for a while.
... Well, I guess you could say that was the cute side of catgirls.
[Vanilla]: 「Hmm? Sniff sniff, sniff sniff...」
[Vanilla]: 「Something smells really nice over there.」
[Chocola]: 「You're right! Something smells really good, Master!」
[Kashou]: 「It definitely does. What is this smell...」
I turned towards the source of it.
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Welcome~!」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some delicious, fresh takoyaki~?」
[Food Stand Cat]: 「Would you like to try some piping hot takoyaki with lots of bonito flakes on top~?」
[Chocola]: 「Wah, it's a takoyaki shop run by a catgirl! That's pretty rare, huh, Master?!」
ModelAnswer:
The same exchange happened at the supermarket afterward.
It was so awkward that I can't go to that shopping street for a while.
……Well, if you say cats are cute, then yeah.

Vanilla: "Hmm? Sniff sniff..."
Vanilla: "There's a really good smell coming from over there."
Chocola: "Really? It smells so fragrant and delicious, Master!"
Kashou: "Indeed. This scent..."

They turn their faces towards the direction of the smell.
Street Cat Vendor: "Welcome!"
Street Cat Vendor: "How about some freshly made takoyaki?"
Street Cat Vendor: "Hot and packed with bonito flakes, how about it?"
Chocola: "Wow, a cat takoyaki stand! That's rare, Master!"

metadata:
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)

Question:
[ショコラ]: 「いい子になれるようにって！」
[バニラ]: 「時雨、厳しい。でもお陰様で色々と覚えた」
[店主]: 「そうなんだ？　良いご主人様なのね」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、でもご主人さまはご主人さまなんです！」
[ショコラ]: 「時雨ちゃんは時雨ちゃんですから！　ね、ご主人さま？」
[バニラ]: 「通訳すると、時雨は大事な友達」
[バニラ]: 「ご主人って呼ぶのはこっちのご主人だけってことで」
[店主]: 「あはは。愛されてるんだね、ご主人さまは？」
[嘉祥]: 「まぁ、ありがたいことに」
肘で軽く小突かれる。
照れくさいような苦笑いで返事を返す。
……外だと流石にちょっと照れくさい。
reference_answer:
[Chocola]: 「She said we'd grow up to be good catgirls if we listened to her!」
[Vanilla]: 「Shigure was tough on us. But thanks to her, we learned a lot.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Really? What a wonderful owner you have.」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, but Master is Master!」
[Chocola]: 「And Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?」
[Vanilla]: 「In other words, Shigure is an important friend.」
[Vanilla]: 「And when we say 'Master,' we are referring to Master over here.」
[Food Stand Owner]: 「Ahaha! You're a very well-loved "master," aren't you?」
[Kashou]: 「Well, I am grateful.」
She lightly nudged me with her elbow.
I responded with an embarrassed, forced smile.
... Hearing this kind of stuff in public sure was embarrassing.
ModelAnswer:
Chocola: "To become a good girl!"
Vanilla: "Shigure, you're strict. But thanks to that, I've learned a lot."
店主: "Is that so? You have a wonderful Master."
Chocola: "Ah, but Master is Master!"
Chocola: "Shigure-chan is Shigure-chan! Right, Master?"
Vanilla: "In other words, Shigure is an important friend."
Vanilla: "We only call 'Master' our own Master."
店主: "Ahaha. You're really loved, Master?"
Kashou: "Well, I'm grateful for that."
He gets gently nudged with an elbow.
He responds with a slightly embarrassed smile.
……It's a bit embarrassing to be like this outside.

Question:
無慈悲な電子音が響く携帯電話を見つめる。
……時雨と連絡さえ付けば、すぐに解決すると思ってたのに。
[ショコラ]: 「はむ、んぐんぐんぐ、朝ごはんおいしーですね！」
[ショコラ]: 「ご主人さまのごはんはいつでもおいしーですにゃー♪」
[バニラ]: 「ショコラ、ほっぺにケチャップ付いてる」
[バニラ]: 「芸術的にかわいい。舐めてあげちゃう。ぺろぺろ」
当の本人たちはサンドウィッチを満足そうに頬張っている。
ちなみに中身はトマトとチーズとレタス。
それに半熟の目玉焼きを挟み込んだシンプルなもの。
朝食だったらまぁこんなもんだろ。
[嘉祥]: 「お前ら、今日こそは家に帰るんだからな？」
reference_answer:
As the ruthless electronic buzz of the dropped call echoed, I stared at my cell phone.
... And here I thought that I could sort all this out if I could just talk to Shigure.
[Chocola]: 「Munch munch munch, breakfast tastes good!」
[Chocola]: 「Master's breakfast always tastes good, meow~ ♪」
[Vanilla]: 「Chocola, there's some ketchup on your cheek.」
[Vanilla]: 「It's cutely artistic. I'll lick it off. Shlurp slurp~」
The catgirls in question were happily stuffing themselves with sandwiches.
These sandwiches incidentally contained tomato, cheese, and lettuce.
With an over-easy fried egg tucked inside all of that, it was a simple meal.
Breakfast was pretty much like this.
[Kashou]: 「You two are definitely going home today, okay?」
ModelAnswer:
A merciless electronic sound echoes from the cellphone being stared at.
……I thought that if I just got in touch with Shigure, it would be resolved right away.

Chocola: "Hamu, nmgu nmgu nmgu, breakfast is delicious!"
Chocola: "Master's food is always delicious nyan♪"
Vanilla: "Chocola, you have ketchup on your cheek."
Vanilla: "It's adorably artistic. I'll lick it off for you. Pero pero."

The two of them are happily munching on sandwiches.
By the way, they're filled with tomato, cheese, and lettuce,
and include a half-cooked sunny-side-up egg.
For breakfast, something like this is fine.

Kashou: "You two, today you're finally going home, right?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
ハキハキとした笑顔で伝票とペンを差し出される。
[嘉祥]: 「そうですね、えっと……」
受け取った伝票を改めて確認する。
[嘉祥]: 「……どうも、自分が頼んだものと違うみたいなんですけども」
[食器業者]: 「……え、本当ですか？」
[食器業者]: 「それは、品物が違う……ということでしょうか？」
[嘉祥]: 「いえ、頼んだものも確かに入ってるみたいなのですが……」
店内に積まれたダンボールへと視線を向ける。
小さな店内に積まれたダンボールの山、山、山。
むしろ店内がほぼダンボールになっていた。
[嘉祥]: 「見ての通り、ウチではこんなにたくさんの食器は必要ないので……」
[食器業者]: 「す、すみません！　すぐに本社に確認しますので！」
[食器業者]: 「少々お待ち頂いてもよろしいでしょうか！？」
reference_answer:
She smiled brightly and brought out the invoice along with a pen.
[Kashou]: 「Okay, let's see...」
I looked over the sales invoice I received once more.
[Kashou]: 「... Somehow, this doesn't look like what I ordered.」
[Tableware Seller]: 「... Huh, is that so?」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Are you saying that these... aren't the correct items?」
[Kashou]: 「No, the stuff I ordered is in here too, but...」
I looked over at the pile of boxes inside the bakery.
Inside of my tiny bakery was a mountain of boxes. A MOUNTAIN.
It was as if the inside of the bakery had become completely made of boxes.
[Kashou]: 「As you can see, we don't need this much tableware inside the bakery...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I-I'm sorry! I'll check with the main office right away!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Could you give me a few moments?」
ModelAnswer:
A bright smile is given as a receipt and pen are handed over.
Kashou: "Well, let me see..."
The receipt is taken and checked again.
Kashou: "...It seems like what I ordered is different."
Supplier: "...Really?"
Supplier: "So, the items themselves are different...?"
Kashou: "No, it seems like what I ordered is included as well..."
He looks at the cardboard boxes piled up inside the shop.
Mountains of cardboard boxes in the small shop. The shop was almost entirely filled with cardboard boxes.
Kashou: "As you can see, we don't need this many dishes."
Supplier: "I-I'm sorry! I'll confirm with headquarters right away!"
Supplier: "Would you mind waiting for a moment!?"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
[食器業者]: 「こちらのミスで、別の注文書と混じってしまっていたようでして……」
[食器業者]: 「水無月様の方もすぐにご入用と思いますので……」
[食器業者]: 「もしよろしければ、ご注文分の食器を受け取って頂ければと思うのですが……」
[嘉祥]: 「注文分を受け取れって……」
[嘉祥]: 「……え？　この中からですか？」
そびえ立つダンボールの山。
思わず言葉に詰まる。
どれも一様に同じ箱なわけで。
中身を開けてみるまで何が入っているのか分からない。
しかも伝票を見ればどれも最高級のティーセットや食器。
なので、扱いにも細心の注意を払わないととんでもないことになる。
[嘉祥]: 「あの、確かに開店準備もあるので今日もらえたら嬉しいですけども……」
[嘉祥]: 「……今からこれを全部って、相当時間かかりますよね？」
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「Because of an error on our part, it appears that another order got mixed in with yours...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「I imagine that you may be in need of these items right away, Mr. Minaduki...」
[Tableware Seller]: 「So if at all possible, if you would be able to accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「Accept this order...」
[Kashou]: 「... Huh? From all this?」
The mountain of cardboard boxes towered over everything.
I was at a loss for words.
Every box was of equal size.
I wouldn't know what was inside each of them without opening them up.
On top of that, looking at the sales invoice, I could see that they all contained expensive tea sets and tableware.
And if I accepted it all, it would be a lot of work to deal with all the new items.
[Kashou]: 「Uhm, there's still things that need doing in advance of my bakery's opening, so I don't mind accepting these...」
[Kashou]: 「... but it's going to take a while to deal with all of this.」
ModelAnswer:
Food Supplier: "It seems there was a mistake on our end, and this order got mixed up with another one..."
Food Supplier: "...I believe Minaduki-sama will need these items soon as well..."
Food Supplier: "...If it's convenient for you, we would like to have you receive the ordered tableware..."

Kashou: "Receive the ordered items...?"
Kashou: "...Eh? From in here?"

A towering mountain of cardboard boxes.
Words fail him unintentionally.

They are all identical boxes.
You won't know what's inside until you open them.
Moreover, according to the invoices, they are all high-end tea sets and tableware.
So, you have to handle them with extreme care, or something terrible might happen.

Kashou: "Well, since we do need them for opening preparations, it would be great if we could get them today..."
Kashou: "...But taking all of this right now will take quite some time, won't it?"

Question:
[食器業者]: 「私も次の配達に行かないといけないですし……！」

この量じゃ軽く見ても２時間はかかるだろうし……。
かと言って再配達してもらっても二度手間だし……。
[嘉祥]: 「…………ん？」
[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「じー」
[嘉祥]: 「ネコの手があったーっ！！」
[ショコラ＆バニラ]: 「にゃにゃっ！？　にゃんですかぁっ！？」
[食器業者]: 「ネコちゃんたち、本当に助かりました！」
[食器業者]: 「ありがとうございます、ほんとにありがとうございます！」
[食器業者]: 「では私はこれで失礼させて頂きますね！」
[嘉祥]: 「…………はぁ、無駄に疲れた……」
仕分け終わった食器を横目に、
reference_answer:
[Tableware Seller]: 「I have to make it to my next delivery, after all...!」
[Kashou]: 「Look, you don't need to put all this pressure on me...」
From looks of it, it would take two hours or more...
But to have it redelivered would take double the effort, too...
[Kashou]: 「...... Hmm?」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Stare.」
[Kashou]: 「That's right, I have a lifeline!!」
[Chocola&Vanilla]: 「Meow meow?! What is it?!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「You've really saved me, catgirls!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Thank you! Thank you oh so very much!」
[Tableware Seller]: 「Well then, I'll be on my way!」
[Kashou]: 「... Haah, I'm exhausted...」
I glanced at the tableware we had finished organizing...
ModelAnswer:
Dishware Vendor: "I have to go on my next delivery too!"
Kashou: "Well, I can't be pressured like that..."
This amount will take at least two hours even if we look at it lightly...
But asking for a redelivery would also mean double the work...

Kashou: "Hmm?"
Chocola & Vanilla: "Jii"
Kashou: "The cats are here!"
Chocola & Vanilla: "Nyan? What is it!?"
Dishware Vendor: "The kitties really helped out!"
Dishware Vendor: "Thank you, truly thank you!"
Dishware Vendor: "Well then, I'll be excusing myself now."
Kashou: "...Haa, I'm tired for no reason..."
Looking at the sorted dishware to the side.

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「……ネコくらい単純に生きられれば、色々と楽なんだろうけどな」
窓に貼られている店の名前に目を向けながら。
苦笑いを振り払って、届いたばかりのティーセットを片付け始めた。
[バニラ]: 「あれ、今日はあのたこ焼き屋がいない」
昨日と同じ夕方の公園通り。
でも今日は屋台は見当たらない。
ネコたちを実家に送ろうにも今日に限って誰もおらず。
俺も実家の鍵は置いて来てしまっていた。
だから時雨が帰宅するまで時間調整で買い物へ。
[ショコラ]: 「……え？　あ、ご、ごめんバニラ！」
[ショコラ]: 「何だっけ、マタタビだっけ？」
[バニラ]: 「だいたいそんな感じ」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「... It must be pretty nice to live the simple life of a catgirl, huh?」
I pondered as I looked at the name of the bakery affixed to the window.
With a bitter smile, I began to clean up the tea sets that had arrived earlier.
[Vanilla]: 「Huh, that takoyaki seller isn't here today.」
Just like yesterday, we took a walk through the park in the evening.
However, that food stand was nowhere to be found.
It just so happened that no one was home on the day I decided to take the two catgirls home.
I had also happened to leave the house key behind.
So to make good use of time, I went to do some shopping before Shigure got home.
[Chocola]: 「... Eh? Ah, s-sorry, Vanilla!」
[Chocola]: 「What was it called... catnip?」
[Vanilla]: 「That sounds about right.」
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "...If I could just live as simply as a cat, things would be much easier."
He glanced at the store name on the window while starting to put away the newly arrived tea set with a wry smile.

Vanilla: "Huh? That takoyaki stand isn't here today."

The same evening park street as yesterday. But today, no stalls were in sight.
Even if I wanted to send the cats back home, there was no one around today.
I had also left my house key at home.
So, I decided to go shopping to kill time until Shigure returns.

Chocola: "...Huh? Oh, sorry, Vanilla!"
Chocola: "What was it again, catnip?"
Vanilla: "Something like that."

metadata:
[character] Name: Chocola (ショコラ) | Gender: Female
[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「ショコラ、疲れたなら少し休んでくか？」
[ショコラ]: 「あ、はい、少しだけ……」
[ショコラ]: 「でも大丈夫ですから。心配かけてごめんなさい、ご主人さま」
[嘉祥]: 「……別に謝ることじゃないだろ」
困ったような笑顔で頭を下げる。
元気がない理由なんか分かり切ってるから。
だから何も言わずにいるしかない。
[嘉祥]: 「じゃあちょうどそこにベンチがあるし、少し休んでくか」
[バニラ]: 「じゃあ私、何か飲み物買ってくる」
[嘉祥]: 「ああ、頼む。全員分な」
[バニラ]: 「了解。任された」
バニラに小銭を渡してショコラをベンチに促す。
よく吹き抜ける潮風が公園の木々をざわめかせる。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Chocola, if you're tired, why don't we rest a bit?」
[Chocola]: 「Ah, okay. Maybe a little bit...」
[Chocola]: 「... Ah, no, Chocola is fine. Sorry to worry you, Master.」
[Kashou]: 「... There's no need for you to apologize.」
She had a troubled smile on her face as she nodded.
It was pretty clear why she wasn't in good spirits.
That's why there was nothing I could really say to her.
[Kashou]: 「Well, there happens to be a bench over there, so why don't we rest a bit?」
[Vanilla]: 「In that case, I will go buy something to drink.」
[Kashou]: 「Ahh, thanks. Something for everyone, okay?」
[Vanilla]: 「Understood. Leave it to me.」
I handed Vanilla some change and offered the bench to Chocola.
The constant sea breeze rustled the trees in the park.
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Chocola, if you're tired, why don't you rest a bit?"
Chocola: "Ah, yes, just for a little while..."
Chocola: "But I'm fine really. Sorry to worry you, Master."
Kashou: "...There's no need to apologize."
He smiles in a troubled way and bows his head.
He knows the reason she lacks energy.
So he can only stay silent.
Kashou: "Well, there happens to be a bench right over there, so why don't you rest for a bit?"
Vanilla: "Then I'll go buy some drinks."
Kashou: "Yeah, thanks. Get enough for everyone."
Vanilla: "Got it. Leave it to me."
He hands Vanilla some change and guides Chocola to the bench.
The strong sea breeze rustles the trees in the park.

行く先がちょっとだけ不安になりながらも。
二匹の頭を愛情を込めてくしゃくしゃと撫でつける。
[嘉祥]: 「よし、じゃあ商店街に戻るか」
[ショコラ]: 「へ？　何でですか？　お買い物はもう終わったんですよね？」

reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「From here on out, we need to do our best all together.」
[Chocola]: 「Of course! ♪ Chocola is all right even if we don't have fatty tuna for dinner every night! Just occasionally is good enough!」
[Vanilla]: 「For meat, A4 grade is fine as long as it's Matsuzaka beef. Fatty meat is the best!」
[Kashou]: 「... Is that all you guys have been eating at home?!」
Even if the road ahead of us is uncertain...
I lovingly rubbed their heads, disheveling their hair.
[Kashou]: 「All right, why don't we head back to the shopping district then?」
[Chocola]: 「Eh? Why is that? Aren't you done with shopping already?」
[Kashou]: 「We have to go buy that shampoo you guys liked, don't we?」
[Vanilla]: 「Ohhh~ Master is so cool!」
[Vanilla]: 「While we're at it, let's buy some Matsuzaka beef.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "We have to do our best from now on. Together."
Chocola: "Yes! It's okay if it's not fatty tuna every night! Even just sometimes is fine!"
Vanilla: "A4 beef is good too. If it's Matsusaka Wagyu, the fat is amazing."
Kashou: "...You two, did you eat nothing but that kind of stuff when you were at your old home?"
Feeling a bit anxious about where they are going, he gently pats both of their heads with affection.
Kashou: "Alright, let's head back to the shopping district."
Chocola: "Huh? Why? I thought we already finished shopping?"
Kashou: "We need to buy your favorite shampoo, right?"
Vanilla: "Oh Master, how cool."
Vanilla: "And while we're at it, let's get some Matsusaka Wagyu too."

metadata:

Question:

reference_answer:
The first thing I saw this morning was so unexpected, my brain couldn't process it all.
[Shigure]: 「Good morning, Nii-sama.」
[Shigure]: 「This recent incident has gotten me thinking...」
She wore a sunny smile that no cloud could cover up.
The catgirls looked at me with similar smiles.
I felt myself break out in a cold sweat...
[Kashou]: 「Haah... thinking... about what...?」
I only managed to get out that much.
[Shigure]: 「After that incident, I learned that there's no way to keep Nii-sama from attempting to achieve the impossible.」
[Shigure]: 「However, it's also a fact that his dear little sister -- namely me -- is losing sleep from worrying about him so much.」
[Shigure]: 「Then, I thought that maybe having more workers would lessen Nii-sama's burden. That was the best plan.」
[Kashou]: 「...... Huh.」

The first thing in the morning, an unexpected scene left me unable to process what was happening.

Minaduki Shigure: "Good morning, Ani-sama."

A bright and clear smile with no hint of clouds.

The other cats are also smiling at me in the same way.

I feel a cold sweat trickling down as

Minaduki Kashou: "Haa... Thought about what..."

I manage to say only that much.

Minaduki Shigure: "Through this matter, I've come to understand that telling Ani-sama not to push himself is an impossible task."

Minaduki Shigure: "However, I too have been kept awake at night with worry as a sister. That is also a fact..."

Minaduki Kashou: "........Haa"

metadata: [character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
Question:
仕入れ先に頼みたいことがあった。急ぎではないが、早いうちに電話しておいたほうがいい。
個人経営のパティスリーなら普通のことだと思うが、俺は仕入れ先の一つ一つと自分で交渉をしている。
一般流通されていないような食材も、まとまった量を仕入れるなら、売ってくれる農家もある。
味の探究は、食材を探す旅でもあった。
皆が観光で盛り上がっているときに、仕事の話をするのも野暮なので、俺は私用があると言って、部屋を離れる。
念のために旅館からも出て、静かな場所で話すことにした。
電話をかける。
[嘉祥]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[嘉祥]: 「ふぅ……」
国外からの注文ということで先方に驚かれたが、どうにか発送してくれそうだ。
俺は旅館の中へと戻る。
reference_answer:
There's something I wanna request from a supplier. It's no rush, but it's a good idea to give him a phone call as soon as possible.
I think it's pretty common for an independently-owned patisserie, but I negotiate with every single supplier on my own.
Even for ingredients not in circulation for the general public, if I need to replenish my supply of them in bulk, there are farmers who will buy it for me.
Researching flavors is also a journey to search for ingredients.
Since it'd be uncouth of me to talk about work when everyone is excited about sightseeing, I tell them that I have personal business to take care of and leave the room.
Just to be sure, I leave the inn and decide to talk someplace quieter.
I make my phone call.
[Kashou]: 「Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?」
[Kashou]: 「Phew...」
I was met with surprise from the other person on the line since it was an order from overseas, but it seems they'll be putting in my order.
I return to the inn.
ModelAnswer:
There was something I wanted to ask my supplier. It wasn't urgent, but it would be better to call them sooner rather than later.
For a privately-owned patisserie, this is usually standard practice, but I personally negotiate with each of my suppliers.
Even for ingredients that aren't commonly distributed, if you want to buy them in bulk, there are farmers who will sell to you.
Exploring flavors is also a journey to find the right ingredients.

While everyone else was getting excited about sightseeing, it would be rude to talk about work, so I said I had personal business and left the room. Just to be safe, I even went outside the inn to find a quiet place to talk.
I made the call.
Master: "Bonjour, c'est Kashou Minaduki de La Soleil Japon. Est-ce que je pourrais parler à M. James Carter?"
Master: "Fuu..."

The other party was surprised by the order from overseas, but it seemed like they would manage to send it out.
I returned to the inn.

[character] Name: Minaduki Kashou (水無月 嘉祥) | Gender: Male | Aliases: Master (ご主人さま)
[character] Name: Minaduki Shigure (水無月 時雨) | Gender: Female
Question:
[嘉祥]: 「どれ、１つ食べてみるか」
屋台で温泉まんじゅうを１つ買った。
できたて熱々だ。
かじってみると、ふっくらしていて、思っていたよりしっとりした食感だった。
舌のうえで、ほろほろと餡子が崩れて、甘味が広がる。
[嘉祥]: 「なるほど……ほふほふ……これは、美味しいな」
俺が作る洋菓子も、実家の和菓子も、温かいものを出すということはない。
熱々のまんじゅうを、ほふほふ言いながら食べるのは、これはこれで面白い体験だった。
[嘉祥]: 「そういえば、温泉街には何度か来ているけれど……食べたことなかったな」
昔はネコたちがいなかったからだ。
両親と時雨と俺の４人で旅行しても、買い食いしようなんて話にはならなかった。
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Well then, maybe I should have one.」
I buy a hot-spring manju bun from the stand.
It's freshly made and piping hot.
I take a bite into it, and my mouth is greeted by a fluffy and moist sensation.
Atop my tongue, the red bean paste starts to break down, and the sweetness starts to spread.
[Kashou]: 「Now I see... Fff, Fff... This is pretty good.」
Neither the Western sweets I make nor the Japanese sweets my family makes are ever served warm.
Eating a piping-hot manju bun while huffing to cool it down in my mouth is a pretty interesting experience in its own right.
[Kashou]: 「You know, I've been to the hot spring district plenty of times in the past, but... I never ate one of these before.」
Mostly because the catgirls weren't around back then.
Even when the four of us—my parents, Shigure, and I—traveled, buying local snacks and eating never came into the equation.
ModelAnswer:
Minaduki Kashou: "Let's see, I'll try one."
He bought a steamed bun from a street vendor.
It was freshly made and piping hot.
Taking a bite, it was fluffy and had a moister texture than he expected.
The sweet red bean paste crumbled softly in his mouth, spreading its sweetness.
Minaduki Kashou: "I see... hofu hofu... this is delicious."
Neither the Western pastries he makes nor the traditional sweets from his family home are served warm.
Eating a hot steamed bun while saying 'hofu hofu' was an interesting experience in its own way.
Minaduki Kashou: "Now that I think about it, I've been to the hot spring town several times... but never tried one."
In the past, there were no cats around.
Even when traveling with his parents, Shigure, and himself, the idea of buying snacks on the go didn't come up.

Question:
[嘉祥]: 「やあ、ここに居たのか、時雨。もしかして用事？」
[時雨]: 「いいえ、もう大丈夫です」
[嘉祥]: 「もしかして、時雨も仕事の電話だったのかな？」
[時雨]: 「……は、はい。すみません。せっかくの旅行中に」
[嘉祥]: 「謝るようなことじゃないよ。ソレイユは定休日だけど、世間は平日なんだし」
詳しくは聞いていないが、時雨は会社を経営しているらしい。
その収入で、ネコたちの衣服を買ったり、鈴持ちの受験をさせたり。
父親は俺に対しては厳しいが、妹の時雨には甘い。ネコのことも商売のことも、自由にさせているようだった。
[嘉祥]: 「ネコたちは、思い思いに満喫してたよ。卓球とか、ゲームとか……売店とか」
reference_answer:
[Kashou]: 「Heya, so this is where you've been, Shigure? Did you need something?」
[Shigure]: 「No, I'm fine now.」
[Kashou]: 「Did you have to put in a call for work, too, by any chance?」
[Shigure]: 「...Y-Yes. I apologize for doing it in the middle of our vacation.」
[Kashou]: 「Nothing to apologize over. La Soleil may be on a regular holiday, but it is a weekday by normal standards.」
She never told me the specifics, but Shigure apparently runs a company.
With her income, she's able to buy the catgirls' clothes and allow them to take bell-holder exams, among other things.
My dad is harsh toward me, but he's soft toward my younger sister, Shigure. It seems that he is pretty liberal toward the catgirls and his business.
[Kashou]: 「The catgirls are enjoying themselves individually. Playing ping-pong, playing video games... buying from the concession stand.」
ModelAnswer:
Kashou: "Hey, there you are, Shigure. Did something happen?"

Shigure: "No, I'm fine now."

Kashou: "Was it a work call for you too, Shigure?"

Shigure: "...Yes. Sorry. Even though we're on vacation."

Kashou: "There's no need to apologize. La Soleil is closed today, but the rest of the world is open as usual."

I don't know the details, but apparently Shigure runs a company.
With her income, she buys clothes for the cats and pays for Bell's exam fees.
My father is strict with me, but he's lenient with my sister Shigure. He seems to let her handle things freely, whether it's about the cats or business.

Kashou: "The cats were enjoying themselves in their own ways. Table tennis, games... the shops."

そういうことになった。
[時雨]: 「それでは、兄様への想いを込めて……」
歌いはじめると、雰囲気が一変した。
[時雨]: 「～～～♪」
[嘉祥]: 「……すごい」

[嘉祥]: 「めちゃくちゃ上手いじゃないか！」

reference_answer:
[Shigure]: 「I am glad to hear that... Nii-sama, how about we both enjoy ourselves—just us, as brother and sister?」
[Kashou]: 「Sure, but what did you have in mind?」
[Shigure]: 「I've heard they have a karaoke room here.」
[Kashou]: 「Karaoke, eh? I only went a bit back in high school. Can you sing, Shigure?」
[Shigure]: 「I dabbled in chorus when I was a child.」
Sounds like a plan, then.
[Shigure]: 「Now then, this will be dedicated to you, Nii-sama...」
Once she starts singing, the mood gets turned on its head.
[Shigure]: 「~~~♪」
[Kashou]: 「...Amazing.」
[Shigure]: 「Hah~ It has been quite some time since I've exerted my voice like that.」
[Kashou]: 「You're REALLY good!」
To be frank, she's practically pro level. I give her generous applause.
ModelAnswer:
Shigure: "That's good to hear... Master, how about we spend some time together just the two of us?"

Kashou: "Sure, what do you want to do?"

Shigure: "There's a karaoke room available."

Kashou: "Karaoke huh... I only went once during high school. Shigure, can you sing?"

Shigure: "I did some choral singing when I was younger, so a little bit."

So it was decided.

Shigure: "Then, with feelings for Master in mind..."

As she began to sing, the atmosphere changed completely.
Shigure: "～～～♪"

Kashou: "...amazing."

Shigure: "Whew~, it's been a while since I've sung so loudly."

Kashou: "You're incredibly good!"

To be honest, she was on par with a professional. I gave her enthusiastic applause.

reference_answer:

How many dishes they produce depends on the family, though.

[Kashou]: 「Well, I mean... even for general home cooking in Japan, from other countries' perspective, it looks like a Japanese version of a full course meal.」

reference_answer:

[Beignet]: 「Then, once she became the catgirl here, she would always say she wanted to help out around shop and even made her name Fraise.」
[Kashou]: 「If memory serves, a catgirl picks their name when they're three months old, so that's when she came here, huh?」
[Fraise]: 「I know you're really busy right now, so... I decided that I wouldn't say anything about me.」
[Fraise]: 「But now that I've eaten the macaron I've dreamed about... I just couldn't control myself any longer...」

[Kashou]: 「Also, I appreciate you helping out Mentor in such big ways as well.」

Kashou: "I remember cats decide their names around three months old. Is that where it came from?"

Fraise: "But I've been dreaming of eating macarons for so long... I couldn't hold back anymore."

Kashou: "Yeah, of course. Thank you for remembering, Fraise."
Kashou: "And thank you too, Mentor. For all your help, I'm grateful."

reference_answer:

[Kashou]: 「Ooh, we've got even more customers than we did yesterday. It's looking a lot like Christmas over here.」

Shigure holds out her cellphone to reveal a line of comments praising Fraise.

[Shigure]: 「Urk...」
[Kashou]: 「Th-That's not happening today! C'mon, believe me!」
[Awayuki]: 「And for you, too, Kashou.」
[Kashou]: 「Oh, yeah... Thanks.」
[Awayuki]: 「Open it.」
I remove the wrapping paper and open the small box as instructed.
[Kashou]: 「...A picture frame?」
It doesn't have a picture in it.
[Awayuki]: 「I think it'd be fun if you'd decorate your rooms with your best memory from this past year.」
That reminds me that my mother wanted a picture frame and Shigure got her one as a birthday present.

Awayuki: "It might be a bit early, but Kashou-san, he might get mad and leave again, right?"

Awayuki: "Alright, Kashou-san too."

Awayuki: "Why don't you open it?"

Following her words, I removed the wrapping paper and opened the small box.

Kashou: "...A photo frame?"
It seems there is no photograph inside.
Awayuki: "If you put in one of this year's memorable photos and display it in your room, I think it will be fun."
Come to think of it, Mother had been wanting one, so Shigure gave her a present for her birthday.
